entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -10.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
